definition: to be limited to/to be confined to
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: But the formulae for calculating the inner stress of the arch pipes caused by wind oad is confined to equal section.
sentences.chinese: 而现有计算拱管风载内力的公式仅限于等截面范围。

sentences.english: Replaceability is limited to changing the dependency to depend on something different.
sentences.chinese: 可替换性仅限于修改依赖关系以依赖不同的内容。

sentences.english: The shortcomings of China’s medical system are hardly limited to cosmetic and plastic surgery.
sentences.chinese: 中国医疗系统的弊病绝不仅仅局限于美容整形外科。

sentences.english: Their role extends far beyond rough-and-tumble play, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 他们的角色远远不局限于乱七八糟的玩耍，专家说。

sentences.english: Whatever the problem, it is not confined to Japan.
sentences.chinese: 无论是什么问题，都不仅限于在日本发生。

sentences.english: Second, the material of the wish to no longer limited to financial treatment.
sentences.chinese: 其二，物质性的欲不再只限于经济待遇。

sentences.english: Bycatch was not confined to drift-netting.
sentences.chinese: 副捕获物不仅限于漂网捕鱼。

sentences.english: Job options have become much wider and less geared to a single work-unit.
sentences.chinese: 人们面对更多的工作机会，不受限于单一的工作单位。

sentences.english: Available with threaded end connections only.
sentences.chinese: 仅限于螺纹连接端口连接件。

sentences.english: The semantic synonym expansion mechanism is limited to expand simple keyword queries.
sentences.chinese: 语义同义词扩展机制仅限于扩展简单的关键字查询。

sentences.english: The conference covered the following areas, but not limited to the following areas.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议征稿主要包括以下领域，但不限于以下范围。

sentences.english: Since the damage was made only to the turning gear , vessel will carry out sea trial tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 由于损坏仅限于盘车机，该船明天将进行海上实验。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the models were restricted to open-type linkages.
sentences.chinese: 起初，这个模型是局限于开式连接。

sentences.english: Both clinical and technical monitoring must not be limited only to the patient but also include the anaesthetic machine.
sentences.chinese: 临床监测和技术监测不必仅限于动物也可包括麻醉机。

sentences.english: There is a sense in which the entire Decalogue was limited to the covenant community only.
sentences.chinese: 可以说，整个十诫是只限于圣约群体的。

sentences.english: There is no specific therapy for HPS, and treatment is usually limited to supportive care.
sentences.chinese: HPS尚缺乏特效疗法，一般仅限于支持治疗。

definition: to limit/to confine/to restrict sth within set boundaries
to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
to exclude/not including sth (when counting or listing)/except for
apart from/other than/except for/external/outside of/on the other side of/beyond
